description:
The Placement API user doc [1] says:

  API Reference
  A full API reference is forthcoming, but until then ...

That reference has since been published [2].

[1] https://docs.openstack.org/nova/pike/user/placement.html#api-reference
[2] https://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/placement/
title: Placement user doc: add link to API reference

comments.content:
The Placement API user doc [1] says:

  API Reference
  A full API reference is forthcoming, but until then ...

That reference has since been published [2].

[1] https://docs.openstack.org/nova/pike/user/placement.html#api-reference
[2] https://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/placement/

Branch:    stable/pike

commit cdff10e94e3f1e4248537fe81b63835fbe84769b
Author: Eric Fried <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Aug 31 10:08:12 2017 -0500

    [placement] Update user doc with api-ref link
    
    The Placement API user guide [1] mentions a not-yet-available REST API
    reference which has since become available [2]; update with the link.
    
    [1] https://docs.openstack.org/nova/pike/user/placement.html#api-reference
    [2] https://developer.openstack.org/api-ref/placement/
    
    Closes-Bug: #1714284
    Change-Id: Ic368327aa4a81f4217aecb4af3d9358502676234
    (cherry picked from commit 4784909352dd1cbb21ba12ec39a863f1ad5ed746)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 16.0.1 release.
